## ðŸš¨ Critical UX/UI Issues Found

### ðŸŸ  HIGH SEVERITY

#### 1. Touch Target Too Small
**Location:** Registration page (`/register`)  
**Element:** "Create Commander Account" button  
**Current Size:** 398x40px  
**Required:** 44x44px minimum (iOS/Android standard)

**Impact:**  
- Users on mobile will frequently mis-tap
- Frustrating user experience
- High abandonment rate on mobile devices
- Fails WCAG accessibility guidelines

**Recommendation:**  
```css
/* Increase button minimum height */
.submit-button {
  min-height: 48px;  /* 44px + 4px visual buffer */
  padding: 12px 24px;
  /* Ensure adequate touch area */
}
```

**Priority:** ðŸ”´ **CRITICAL** - Fix immediately before mobile launch

---

### ðŸŸ¡ MEDIUM SEVERITY

#### 2. Low Contrast Elements
**Location:** Landing page (`/`)  
**Affected:** 6 elements  
**Issue:** Text/background contrast below WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 ratio)

**Impact:**  
- Difficult to read for users with visual impairments
- Poor accessibility score
- May cause eye strain
- Fails WCAG 2.1 Level AA compliance

**Recommendation:**  
```css
/* Example contrast fix */
.text-slate-400 {
  /* Old: might be too light on dark backgrounds */
  color: #94a3b8;
  
  /* New: ensure 4.5:1 contrast */
  color: #cbd5e1; /* Or adjust as needed */
}
```

**Priority:** ðŸŸ¡ **MEDIUM** - Fix in next sprint

---

## ðŸ› Technical Issues

### Form Handler Timeout
**Symptom:** Registration form not filling properly  
**Possible Causes:**
1. Input selectors too complex for generic handler
2. JavaScript validation blocking programmatic fill
3. Async form initialization not complete
4. Custom input components (Vue/React) not standard HTML

**Impact:**  
- Player cannot complete registration automatically
- Blocks full game exploration
- Testing workflow interrupted

**Recommendation:**  
1. Add `data-testid` attributes to form inputs
2. Ensure inputs accept programmatic `.fill()` calls
3. Disable client-side validation during E2E tests
4. Use standard HTML input elements or ensure custom components are accessible

## ðŸ“ Tasks for Agency

### For Hammer (Implementation)
```markdown
## [PLAYER_FEEDBACK] Touch Targets Below Minimum Size

**Priority:** CRITICAL  
**Component:** All primary action buttons  
**File:** Registration form (`/register`)

**Issue:**  
Button heights are 40px, below the 44x44px minimum for mobile touch targets (iOS/Android guidelines).

**Fix:**  
- Increase all button `min-height` to 48px
- Add adequate padding (12px vertical minimum)
- Test on actual mobile devices

**Acceptance Criteria:**  
- All buttons >= 44x44px touch area
- Adequate spacing between buttons (8px minimum)
- No layout breaks on mobile viewport (390x844px)
```

### For Architect (Design)
```markdown
## [PLAYER_FEEDBACK] Accessibility - Color Contrast

**Priority:** MEDIUM  
**Category:** Visual Design

**Issue:**  
Multiple text elements fail WCAG AA contrast requirements (4.5:1 ratio).

**Fix:**  
- Audit color palette
- Ensure all text meets contrast standards
- Update design system documentation

**Tools:**  
- Use WebAIM Contrast Checker
- Run Lighthouse accessibility audit
```
